price: Siku hiyo mtahudhurishwa - haitafichika siri yoyote yenu.
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ تُعۡرَضُونَ لَا تَخۡفَىٰ مِنكُمۡ خَافِيَةٞ
footnotes: Siku hiyo ndio mtaletwa kwa ajili ya kuhisabiwa. Wala haifichikani siri yenu yoyote mliyo kuwa mkiificha.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin tuʿ'raḍūna lā takhfā minkum khāfiyatun
